timeline.bodyText:
A javadoc shouldn't start with "if" IMO :-)
I would make it something like Pre-builds sync enablement flag. Is taken into account only when scmUrl contains an external url. Defaults to true if null.

timeline.author: michalovjan

timeline.bodyText: Maybe change the wording a bit. It's not a list of group config revisions but build config revisions associated with the group.
timeline.author: michalovjan

timeline.bodyText:
As I was the person that added this feature, I can specify it.
"Id of the product version. The product version is used to prevent duplicate milestones with the same milestone version."
timeline.author: michalovjan

timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't it be called "waitingForDependencies" instead of "awaitingForDependencies"? On the other hand,
changing name of an argument would break API on UI.
timeline.author: michalovjan

replies.bodyText: And the possible change should be handled in different issue.

replies.bodyText: +1 to rename it. We should do it for 2.0. Have you created the issue?
